definition: clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes

sentences.english: Medallists must attend the awards ceremony either in full gear or team uniform.
sentences.chinese: 獲獎運動員參加頒獎儀式須着隊服或比賽服。

sentences.english: The player in blue keeps fighting off his opponent's smashes.
sentences.chinese: 身穿藍色隊服的選手連續擊退對手幾個抽球。

sentences.english: Now you can quit your bitching about the whole uniform thing.
sentences.chinese: 現在你們就不成天爲了隊服的事跟我發牢騷了。

sentences.english: Updated the Toronto Raptors uniform by reducing the thickness of the red trim around the arms.
sentences.chinese: 更新了多倫多猛龍隊的隊服，減少了環臂紅邊的厚度。

definition: fully armed/armed to the teeth/fig. fully equipped
competition schedule/the course of a race
joy of first experience (idiom)/the pleasure of reading sth for the first time
to compete/to take part (in a sports event)
everyone present applauds/universal acclaim/a standing ovation/to bring the house down

definition: Brooklyn, borough of New York City
